document_data.name: Ki-rin
document_data.mainbody: The '''Ki-rin language''' was the racial language of [[ki-rin]]s, a race of [[celestial]] creatures who otherwise spoke to all others through means of telepathy.
document_data.Speakers: Beyond ki-rins themselves, this language was spoken in a rudimentary fashion by [[dragon horse]]s.

Dictionary.Unknown Words: The Ki-rin tongue included a word for "trap".<ref>{{Cite organized play/LC/Twilight of the Dirty Turtles|8}}<ref group="note" name="word">What exactly this word is was never stated within the cited text.

document_data.Notable Speakers: * Sir [[Emelyn|Emelyn the Gray]], a [[human]] [[wizard]] who lived in the [[Bloodstone Lands]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]], learned the ki-rin language in his old age sometime before the [[Bloodstone Wars]].
